detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Ankle-length trousers in a striped weave with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Slightly wider, tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. Seamless.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with small frills at the side of the hems.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Short imitation suede skirt in a double layer at the front with eyelets and lacing. Visible zip at the back. Lined.
Boxy-style shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves.

Studio Collection. Large, tear-shaped brooch in silver-coloured metal decorated with various-shaped glass rhinestones. Pin with a safety catch. Length approx. 10.5 cm. Width approx. 7 cm. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings with a shimmering print. Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Wide, raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Wide, V-neck blouse in soft cotton flannel with a collar, pleats at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neckline and straight hem.
Wide shorts in a linen and viscose weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Pleats at the front and side pockets.
Fitted jumpsuit with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and print motif on the legs.
Chino shorts in washed cotton poplin with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.

Shirt in organic Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long coat in soft pile with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and front pockets. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a dress and puff pants in a cotton weave. Dress with an opening and buttons at the sides and a seam at the waist with gathers at the front and elastication at the back. Shoulder straps that have decorative knot details at the front and cross at the back where they fasten with concealed buttons. Puff pants with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Unlined.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.

Jersey sports top in a stretch cotton blend with taped details. Lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, a rounded hem and reflective details. Zipped pocket on one side and a high zip on the other. Slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in printed organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and long legs. Press studs down the front that continue down one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Patterned bikini. Top with a lined front and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back. Fully lined bottoms with a flounce at the top.
Short skater skirt in soft fabric. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit bamboo blend with wide elastication at the tops.
Long-sleeved jumper in a knit containing some wool with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.

Denim shorts with a regular waist and button fly. Side pockets, a coin pocket with a button and three back pockets, one of which is a welt pocket with a button. Straight legs with shaping seams that have longer hems at the front. Straight fit.
Short-sleeved shirt in patterned Tencel™ lyocell with a resort collar, French front, open chest pocket and straight-cut hem.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Boat-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.

Long-sleeved, fancy dress body in soft velour with a concealed zip at the back, fringed epaulettes, shimmering, decorative buttons down the front and shimmering trims at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gathered peplum that is open at the front and back.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, narrow straps and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Playsuit in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons at the top, flap chest pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with a tie at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs. Unlined.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Body in soft cotton jersey with a wide flounce at the top in a cotton weave. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Joggers in soft, washed denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, back pocket and elasticated hems.
Short-sleeved top in textured plumeti jersey with a deep V-neck with gathers at the top and a straight-cut hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pleated trousers in jersey with a slight sheen. High elasticated waist and wide, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Stretch jersey vest top with deep armholes, cut-out sections at the sides and an elasticated hem.
Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with slits and ties at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud).
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and slightly wider, tapered legs.

Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbed sections at the knees. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal, zipped front pockets and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Imitation suede Captain’s cap. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a diagonal flounced trim at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the top and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in supersoft stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and raised print on one back pocket.
Handbag accessory in the shape of a tied scarf in a patterned weave with a metal keyring and carabiner hook. Length approx. 34 cm.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with press-studs, a zip down the front and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. One chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.

Padded, gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and a zip down the front. Handwarmer pockets, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep neckline and buttons at the front. Unlined.

V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with narrow ties, covered buttons down the front and short, double-layered puff sleeves with concealed elastication. Tapered waist and a gently flared hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in a textured cotton weave with embroidery at the top, a V-neck and double-layered bodice with scalloped edges front and back. Long sleeves with pin-tucks and narrow, buttoned cuffs, a concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Lined.
Fancy dress costume in soft pile with matching, padded accessories. Hood, a zip down the front with a chin guard, open chest pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Sleeveless chiffon dress with an elasticated neckline with decorative gathers, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and smocking at the waist. Longer at the back. Satin lining.
Cargo trousers in crisp cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, and front, back and leg pockets, all with a flap and button. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and slits in the sides.
5-pocket trousers in superstretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems.
5-pocket, low-rise, skinny-fit jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and super-skinny legs.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Waist belt with a metal buckle. The belt narrows at the ends. Width 2-4 cm.
Body in soft mesh and microfibre with a deep V-neck, wide shoulder straps that twist at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jumper in a soft rib knit in a short, slightly wider style with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with a pompom on the top, a ribbed, turned-up hem, earflaps and ties under the chin.
Calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in softly draping jersey with a sheen. Narrow cut with draping and and an opening at the top, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, and wide straps at the back. Lined.
